metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1582 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A race problem was found in fs/proc/task_mmu.c in the memory management sub-component in the Linux kernel. This issue may allow a local attacker with user privilege to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-23-generic - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-5.15.0-23-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-23-generic - 5.15.0-23.23
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-23-generic-64k - 5.15.0-23.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-aws - 5.15.0-1003.5
No subscription required
